definitions.definition: A small projection from a membrane , particularly those found in the mucous membranes of the intestines .
One of the fine soft hairs on fruits, flowers, and other parts of plants.

main_definition: ( biology ) A small projection from a membrane , particularly those found in the mucous membranes of the intestines .
secondary_definitions: ( botany ) One of the fine soft hairs on fruits, flowers, and other parts of plants.
